Set hostnames to the switches

Shutdown all switch interfaces:

```
(config)#int range f0/1-24
(config-if-range)#shut
```

Note:

```
S3(config-if-range)#channel-group 1 mode desirable
%EC-5-L3DONTBNDL2: Fa0/21 suspended: PAGP currently not enabled on the remote port.
%EC-5-L3DONTBNDL2: Fa0/22 suspended: PAGP currently not enabled on the remote port.

```
